---
node_id: 30
title: Module Self-Loading Strategy (30)
---
### Individual modules will load their own state, representing a decentralized state management approach.

Each module itself, such as the markdown tree module, vector module, and history module, will load their own state. This represents a decentralized state management approach, contrasting with a centralized auto-load module.
